title: Champion Kit Themes
body:
{{champion:267}} What champion's kit in your opinion does not match their overall theme? Is there any of them that you would modify to better suit the champions over all feel?

I personally think that Miss Fortune's kit isn't 100% there for me. While I like her passive and her ultimate, I think the other abilities lack a personality that ties them to her. I can kind of see it, but I think there could be something more. I like that double up provides some fun but perhaps I'm just missing something.

Anyone got another champion that just doesn't match up for them?
